description:
A set of Mountings that can be equipped by Miyamoto Iori, including scabbards, a guard, a handle wrapping, and a handle decoration.

Note:
This item is a bonus content for players who purchased the Season Pass.
Mountings can be changed by selecting "Change Mounting" from the Character section in the Pause Menu.
name: Bonus Equipment: Hallowed Relic Sword Mountings
